text: Luis Ernesto Tapia Pérez (21 October 1944 – 13 November 2024) was a Panamanian football forward player.UN GOLEADOR DE RAZA PURA El histórico Cascarita Tapia - La Prensa Tapia made 77 appearances for the Panama national football team between 1963 and 1979. Tapia died from a heart attack in Panama City, Panama on 13 November 2024, at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Panamanian footballers Category:People from Panama City
title: Luis Ernesto Tapia
